price: 38. Waxaana soo dirnay Rusul hortaa oo waxaanu siinnay xaasas iyo ubadba19. Umana laha Rasuulna (awood) inuu iski ula yimaado Mucjiso, Alle oo idma ma ahee. Ajal walba wuxuu leeyahay muddo Alle u gooyo oo qoran.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلٗا مِّن قَبۡلِكَ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا وَذُرِّيَّةٗۚ وَمَا كَانَ لِرَسُولٍ أَن يَأۡتِيَ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۗ لِكُلِّ أَجَلٖ كِتَابٞ
footnotes: 19.Casri kasta wuxuu leeyahay axkaan uu Alle u jideeyo addoomahiisa oo ku saleysan Xikmaddiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā rusulan min qablika wajaʿalnā lahum azwājan wadhurriyyatan wamā kāna lirasūlin an yatiya biāyatin illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi likulli ajalin kitābun
